sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>false</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>false</applies_sc_task><applies_target_record>false</applies_target_record><applies_to>item</applies_to><cat_item display_value="UserRoleDemo">4cf12f0483738610eb38c1b6feaad342</cat_item><cat_variable>IO:04d22b4483738610eb38c1b6feaad342</cat_variable><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><isolate_script>true</isolate_script><messages/><name>ValidateDate</name><order/><published_ref/><script><![CDATA[function onChange(control, oldValue, newValue, isLoading) {
   if (isLoading || newValue == '') {
      return;
   }

   var start = g_form.getValue('start_date');
    var end = g_form.getValue('end_date');

 

    // if (start > end || start == end ) 

	if (start > end )
	
	{
        alert("Start date is greater than OR equal to End date.");
        g_form.clearValue('end_date');
	}
	
   //Type appropriate comment here, and begin script below
   
}]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-07-30 07:13:35</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>8b432f8483738610eb38c1b6feaad3e7</sys_id><sys_mod_count>6</sys_mod_count><sys_name>ValidateDate</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_8b432f8483738610eb38c1b6feaad3e7</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-07-30 11:05:34</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onChange</type><ui_type>0</ui_type><va_supported>true</va_supported><variable_set/><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>

sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>false</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>false</applies_sc_task><applies_target_record>false</applies_target_record><applies_to>item</applies_to><cat_item display_value="UserRoleDemo">4cf12f0483738610eb38c1b6feaad342</cat_item><cat_variable>IO:06626b4483738610eb38c1b6feaad37e</cat_variable><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><isolate_script>true</isolate_script><messages/><name>StrtDateValidate</name><order/><published_ref/><script><![CDATA[function onChange(control, oldValue, newValue, isLoading) {
   if (isLoading || newValue == '') {
      return;
   }
   var start = g_form.getValue('start_date');
    var end = g_form.getValue('end_date');


  
	if(start>end)
	{
       alert('Start date always small then end date');
	g_form.clearValue('start_date');
	}
	

   

   //Type appropriate comment here, and begin script below
   
}]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-07-30 09:29:50</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>64054c5083378610eb38c1b6feaad311</sys_id><sys_mod_count>5</sys_mod_count><sys_name>StrtDateValidate</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_64054c5083378610eb38c1b6feaad311</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-07-30 11:05:29</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onChange</type><ui_type>0</ui_type><va_supported>true</va_supported><variable_set/><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>
